Title: Paradise
Short Description: A Secret Service agent investigates the murder of a former president in a seemingly peaceful community.
Stars: Stars

Title: The Night Agent
Short Description: Low-level FBI agent Peter Sutherland works in the basement of the White House manning a phone that never rings - until the night it does, propelling him into a conspiracy that leads all the way to the Oval Office.
Stars: Sterling K. Brown, Julianne Nicholson, Sarah Shahi

Title: The Recruit
Short Description: Owen Hendricks, a CIA lawyer becomes involved in massive international conflicts with dangerous parties after an asset tries to expose her relationship to the agency.
Directors: Gabriel Basso, Luciane Buchanan, Fola Evans-Akingbola

Title: Companion
Short Description: A weekend getaway with friends at a remote cabin turns into chaos after it's revealed that one of the guests is not what they seem.
Stars: Noah Centineo, Aarti Mann, Colton Dunn

Title: Nosferatu
Short Description: A gothic tale of obsession between a haunted young woman and the terrifying vampire infatuated with her, causing untold horror in its wake.
Stars: Sophie Thatcher, Jack Quaid, Lukas Gage

Title: You're Cordially Invited
Short Description: When two weddings are double-booked at the same venue, the father of one bride and the sister of the other bride try to preserve the wedding weekend.
Stars: Lily-Rose Depp, Nicholas Hoult, Bill Skarsgård

Title: The Brutalist
Short Description: When a visionary architect and his wife flee post-war Europe in 1947 to rebuild their legacy and witness the birth of modern United States, their lives are changed forever by a mysterious, wealthy client.
Stars: Will Ferrell, Reese Witherspoon, Geraldine Viswanathan

Title: American Primeval
Short Description: It follows the gritty and adventurous exploration of the birth of the American West, the violent collisions of cults, religion, and men and women fighting for control of the new world.
Stars: Adrien Brody, Felicity Jones, Guy Pearce

Title: The Substance
Short Description: A fading celebrity takes a black-market drug: a cell-replicating substance that temporarily creates a younger, better version of herself.
Stars: Taylor Kitsch, Betty Gilpin, Dane DeHaan

Title: Babygirl
Short Description: A high-powered CEO puts her career and family on the line when she begins a torrid affair with her much-younger intern.
Stars: Demi Moore, Margaret Qualley, Dennis Quaid

Title: Dexter: Original Sin
Short Description: Miami, 1991. When his bloodthirsty urges can't be ignored any longer, young Dexter Morgan must learn to channel his inner darkness as he transitions from student to avenging serial killer with the guidance of his father, Harry.
Stars: Nicole Kidman, Harris Dickinson, Antonio Banderas

Title: I'm Still Here
Short Description: A mother is forced to reinvent herself when her family's life is shattered by an act of arbitrary violence during the tightening grip of a military dictatorship in Brazil, 1971.
Stars: Patrick Gibson, Christian Slater, Molly Brown

Title: Emilia Pérez
Short Description: Emilia Pérez follows three remarkable women in Mexico, each pursuing their own happiness. Cartel leader Emilia enlists unappreciated lawyer Rita to help fake her death so that she can finally live authentically as her true self.
Stars: Fernanda Torres, Fernanda Montenegro, Selton Mello

Title: High Potential
Short Description: Thanks to her exceptional mind, single-mom-of-three Morgan is able to help solve a crime as she rearranges evidence during her shift as a cleaner for the police department.
Stars: Zoe Saldaña, Karla Sofía Gascón, Selena Gomez

Title: Silo
Short Description: Men and women live in a giant silo underground with several regulations which they believe are in place to protect them from the toxic and ruined world on the surface.
Stars: Kaitlin Olson, Daniel Sunjata, Javicia Leslie

Title: Landman
Short Description: A modern-day tale of fortune seeking in the world of West Texas oil rigs.
Stars: Rebecca Ferguson, Common, Tim Robbins

Title: Kinda Pregnant
Short Description: When Lainy's plan to settle down and start a family falls apart, she puts on a fake baby bump, tells a lie, and accidentally falls for her dream guy.
Stars: Billy Bob Thornton, Ali Larter, Jacob Lofland

Title: Gladiator II
Short Description: After his home is conquered by the tyrannical emperors who now lead Rome, Lucius is forced to enter the Colosseum and must look to his past to find strength to return the glory of Rome to its people.
Stars: Amy Schumer, Will Forte, Jillian Bell

Title: Anora
Short Description: A young escort from Brooklyn meets and impulsively marries the son of a Russian oligarch. Once the news reaches Russia, her fairy tale is threatened as his parents set out for New York to get the marriage annulled.
Stars: Paul Mescal, Denzel Washington, Pedro Pascal

Title: The Pitt
Short Description: The daily lives of healthcare professionals in a Pittsburgh hospital as they juggle personal crises, workplace politics, and the emotional toll of treating critically ill patients, revealing the resilience required in their noble calling.
Stars: Mikey Madison, Paul Weissman, Yura Borisov

Title: Saturday Night
Short Description: At 11:30pm on October 11th, 1975, a ferocious troupe of young comedians and writers changed television forever. Find out what happened behind the scenes in the 90 minutes leading up to the first broadcast of Saturday Night Live (1975).
Stars: Noah Wyle, Tracy Ifeachor, Fiona Dourif

Title: Apple Cider Vinegar
Short Description: The life of wellness guru Belle Gibson, who had a large social media following, where she pretended to be suffering from cancer but keeping the disease under control using self-care therapies. She confessed that none of it was true.
Stars: Gabriel LaBelle, Rachel Sennott, Cory Michael Smith

Title: Wolf Man
Short Description: A family at a remote farmhouse is attacked by an unseen animal, but as the night stretches on, the father begins to transform into something unrecognizable.
Stars: Kaitlyn Dever, Alycia Debnam-Carey, Aisha Dee

Title: A Complete Unknown
Short Description: In 1961, an unknown 19-year-old Bob Dylan arrives in New York City with his guitar and forges relationships with musical icons on his meteoric rise, culminating in a groundbreaking performance that reverberates around the world.
Stars: Christopher Abbott, Julia Garner, Matilda Firth

Title: Conclave
Short Description: When Cardinal Lawrence is tasked with leading one of the world's most secretive and ancient events, selecting a new Pope, he finds himself at the center of a web of conspiracies and intrigue that could shake the very foundation of the Catholic Church.
Stars: Timothée Chalamet, Edward Norton, Elle Fanning

Title: Captain America: Brave New World
Short Description: Sam Wilson, the new Captain America, finds himself in the middle of an international incident and must discover the motive behind a nefarious global plan.
Stars: Ralph Fiennes, Stanley Tucci, John Lithgow

Title: Blink Twice
Short Description: When tech billionaire Slater King meets cocktail waitress Frida at his fundraising gala, he invites her to join him and his friends on a dream vacation on his private island. As strange things start to happen, Frida questions her reality.
Stars: Anthony Mackie, Harrison Ford, Danny Ramirez

Title: Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man
Short Description: The animated series follows Peter Parker on his way to becoming Spider-Man in the MCU, with a journey unlike we've ever seen and a style that celebrates the character's early comic book roots.
Stars: Naomi Ackie, Channing Tatum, Alia Shawkat

Title: Dog Man
Short Description: Dog Man, half dog and half man, he is sworn to protect and serve as he doggedly pursues the feline supervillain Petey the Cat.
Directors: Hudson Thames, Eugene Byrd, Colman Domingo

Title: The Day of the Jackal
Short Description: The Jackal is an elusive assassin who makes his living carrying out hits for the highest fee. He soon meets his match in a tenacious British intelligence officer who tracks him down in a thrilling cat-and-mouse chase across Europe.
Stars: Pete Davidson, Poppy Liu, Lil Rel Howery

Title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
Short Description: Sonic, Knuckles, and Tails reunite against a powerful new adversary, Shadow, a mysterious villain with powers unlike anything they have faced before. With their abilities outmatched, Team Sonic must seek out an unlikely alliance.
Stars: Eddie Redmayne, Lashana Lynch, Eleanor Matsuura

Title: Mo
Short Description: Mo Najjar who straddles the line between two cultures, three languages and "a ton of bullshit." The fictional Mo is a Palestinian refugee living one step away from asylum on the path to U.S. citizenship.
Stars: Jim Carrey, Ben Schwartz, Keanu Reeves

Title: Wicked
Short Description: Elphaba, a misunderstood young woman because of her green skin, and Galinda, a popular girl, become friends at Shiz University in the Land of Oz. After an encounter with the Wonderful Wizard of Oz, their friendship reaches a crossroads.
Stars: Mohammed Amer, Teresa Ruiz, Omar Elba

Title: A Real Pain
Short Description: Mismatched cousins reunite for a tour through Poland to honor their beloved grandmother, but their old tensions resurface against the backdrop of their family history.
Stars: Cynthia Erivo, Ariana Grande, Jeff Goldblum

Title: Flight Risk
Short Description: A pilot transports an Air Marshal accompanying a fugitive to trial. As they cross the Alaskan wilderness, tensions soar and trust is tested, as not everyone on board is who they seem.
Stars: Kieran Culkin, Jesse Eisenberg, Olha Bosova

Title: Prime Target
Short Description: A post-graduate mathematics student discovers an effort being made to destroy his work in finding a pattern in prime numbers that would allow him to access every computer in the world.
Stars: Michelle Dockery, Mark Wahlberg, Topher Grace

Title: The Hunting Party
Short Description: Follows a small team of investigators who are assembled to track down and capture the most dangerous killers ever seen, all of whom have just escaped from a top-secret prison that's not supposed to exist.
Stars: Leo Woodall, Quintessa Swindell, Sidse Babett Knudsen

Title: Back in Action
Short Description: Former CIA spies Emily and Matt are pulled back into espionage after their secret identities are exposed.
Stars: Melissa Roxburgh, Nick Wechsler, Patrick Sabongui

Title: Den of Thieves: Pantera
Short Description: Big Nick is back on the hunt in Europe and closing in on Donnie, who is embroiled in the treacherous world of diamond thieves and the infamous Panther mafia, as they plot a massive heist of the world's largest diamond exchange.
Stars: Jamie Foxx, Cameron Diaz, McKenna Roberts

Title: Solo Leveling
Short Description: Follows the adventures of Sung Jinwoo in a world that is constantly threatened by monsters and evil forces. In his battles Sung transforms himself from the weakest hunter of all mankind to one of the strongest hunters in existence.
Stars: Gerard Butler, O'Shea Jackson Jr., Evin Ahmad

Title: Love Hurts
Short Description: A realtor is pulled back into the life he left behind after his former partner-in-crime resurfaces with an ominous message. With his crime-lord brother also on his trail, he must confront his past and the history he never fully buried.
Stars: Taito Ban, Jimmy Tandel, Rebecca Wang
Ke Huy Quan, Ariana DeBose, Mustafa Shakir

Title: Deva
Short Description: A brilliant yet rebellious police officer uncovers a web of deceit and betrayal while investigating a high-profile case.
Directors: Andres Muhlach, Ashtine Olviga, Rabin Angeles

Title: Pushpa: The Rule - Part 2
Short Description: A smuggling kingpin faces off against a vengeful rival while manipulating politics, making big deals, and navigating tense confrontations. A public apology leads to a dramatic showdown, ending with challenge.
Stars: Pooja Hegde, Shahid Kapoor, Kubbra Sait

Title: Heart Eyes
Short Description: For the past several years, the "Heart Eyes Killer" has wreaked havoc on Valentine's Day by stalking and murdering romantic couples. This Valentine's Day, no couple is safe.
Stars: Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna, Fahadh Faasil

Title: School Spirits
Short Description: Maddie, a teen stuck in the afterlife investigating her own disappearance, goes on a crime-solving mission as she adjusts to high-school purgatory.
Stars: Alex Walker, Lauren O'Hara, Latham Gaines

Title: The Wild Robot
Short Description: After a shipwreck, an intelligent robot called Roz is stranded on an uninhabited island. To survive the harsh environment, Roz bonds with the island's animals and cares for an orphaned baby goose.
Stars: Peyton List, Kristian Ventura, Spencer Macpherson

Title: September 5
Short Description: During the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich, Germany, an American sports broadcasting team must adapt to live coverage the Israeli athletes being held hostage by a terrorist group.
Stars: Lupita Nyong'o, Pedro Pascal, Kit Connor

Short Description: The Duttons face a new set of challenges in the early 20th century, including the rise of Western expansion, Prohibition, and the Great Depression.
Stars: Peter Sarsgaard, John Magaro, Ben Chaplin

Title: The Order
Short Description: A series of bank robberies and car heists frightened communities in the Pacific Northwest. A lone FBI agent believes that the crimes were not the work of financially motivated criminals, but rather a group of dangerous domestic terrorists.
Stars: Harrison Ford, Helen Mirren, Brandon Sklenar
